snippet: Kyle Seitz of Ridgefield, Conn., is accused of negligent homicide in the death of his 15-month-old son, Benjamin, over the summer.
abstract: Kyle Seitz, father of 15-month-old boy who died after being left in hot car in Ridgefield, Conn, turns himself in after being charged with negligent homicide.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Seitz of Ridgefield, Conn., is accused of negligent homicide in the death of his 15-month-old son, Benjamin, over the summer.

headline.main: Connecticut Man Charged After Son Dies in Hot Car
headline.print_headline: Father of Boy Who Died in a Hot Car Is Charged
